ComicInfo.Summary:
Various short satires of pop culture.
Harry basically hangs around while events unfold around him until the last minute, and then Druckermort gets away again.
Horrible summer jobs.
Monroe's father has Monroe fake a terminal disease and with the help of an internet posting and bad tv news reporting, they rake in the cash donations.
Mishaps and triumphs that chickens might face if they went back in time.
Stills from the movie with humorous captions.
The White Spy sells a fake treasure map to the Black Spy, but falls for a trap in the Black Spy's dig.
Comic situations that never happened in the movie.
Things kids find annoying about parents.
Nicole gets arrested to help Paris with a prison break.
Things that might happen to transformers if the tried to live real life as vehicles.
Phony ad for real book "The Secret", but author changed to Blunda Byrne.
Reasons McDonald's restaurants are changing their decor, and insights into how customers will use the new "zones."

ComicInfo.Title: The Fundalini Pages; Harry Plodder and the Torture of the Fanbase; Things to Consider Before Accepting a Summer Job; Monroe and...Gone Internet Phishin'; If Chickens Could Time Travel; MAD Has A Gay Old Time With Outtakes From I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry; Spy Vs. Spy; A MAD Look At Spider-Man 3; Don't You Hate When Your Parents...The Sequel!; The Simple Prisonbreak Life; Everyday Pet Peeves of Transformers; The "Secret" Is Out!; FAQs About McDonald's Trendy Makeover; Drawn-Out Dramas
